<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><add place="above">whoever</add> in the back. Mr <add place="above">Ingram gave Marlowe a mortal wound</add> then drove his dagger through</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">body with a sword that cost three and sixpence. So complete</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Those were the <choice>
